p: Even though there was an attempt to decrease the language bias, all the studies were published in English, despite the origin of the publications. Due to the current nature of the topic addressed, all studies dated from 2020 and comprised the first scientific documents available thus far. The journals comprised different medical specialties, not limited to gynecology and obstetrics, showing the importance of various fields addressing this subject. The characteristics of the studies included here are detailed in Figure 2.
